title: 40 Perch lot facing Colombo-Puttalam Road for Sale
details: 40 Perches land facing Puttalam Colombo road is for immediate sale. Rs 700,000/= for each Perch. Owner is living in Canada and need to dispose the asset as soon as possible. Land is located in Wennappuwa and please contact myself on + 1 647 865 8064 or email: kavinj10@aol.com
